concept.title: Update Xrefs with Demand Loading Turned On
concept.shortdesc: If systemvariable XLOADCTLis set to 0, turn off Xrefs with Demand Loading, load the whole drawing if click the load button.

conbody.p: If system variable XLOADCTL is set to 1, turn on Xrefs with Demand Loading, all other users can't access the xref file when reloading the file with Demand Loading.
If systemvariable XLOADCTLis set to 2, load a temporary copy of the latest version of the xref file to be loaded.
